Authentication.name: Authentication
Authentication.description: Handles user registration, login, and authentication using Firebase Authentication.

embodiment.description: Firebase provides a robust and scalable authentication system that supports multiple methods and is easy to integrate.

Authentication.verification_plan: Unit and integration testing of authentication features.

Task Management.name: Task Management
Task Management.description: Manages the creation, editing, deletion, and marking of tasks as completed. It also filters tasks by completion status.

embodiment.description: Firestore offers real-time data synchronization and scalability, which aligns with the application's requirements for data synchronization across devices.

Task Management.verification_plan: Testing task creation, editing, deletion, and filtering functionality. Testing real-time updates among collaborators.

Notifications.name: Notifications
Notifications.description: Provides push notifications for upcoming deadlines and task reminders using Firebase Cloud Messaging.

embodiment.description: FCM is a reliable service for sending push notifications to Android and iOS devices, ensuring timely reminders and updates for users.

Notifications.verification_plan: Testing notification delivery and user interaction with notifications.

Dashboard.name: Dashboard
Dashboard.description: Displays task statistics and progress visually using React Native Charts and Graphs library.

embodiment.description: Visual representation of task data helps users quickly understand their progress and productivity trends.

Dashboard.verification_plan: Testing the accuracy of data displayed in the dashboard and user experience.

User Interface.name: User Interface
User Interface.description: Provides an intuitive and user-friendly interface for task management, developed using Expo and native components.

embodiment.description: Expo simplifies the development process and native components ensure optimal performance and user experience.

User Interface.verification_plan: Conducting usability testing and gathering user feedback on the interface.

Data Security.name: Data Security
Data Security.description: Ensures data security and privacy in accordance with GDPR guidelines through encryption and access controls.

embodiment.description: GDPR requires personal data protection, and encryption along with strict access controls ensures data security and privacy.

Data Security.verification_plan: Conducting security audits and obtaining necessary certifications.

Cross-Platform Compatibility.name: Cross-Platform Compatibility
Cross-Platform Compatibility.description: Ensures the application is compatible with both iOS and Android platforms using React Native.

embodiment.description: React Native allows for cost-effective development of apps that run on both iOS and Android with minimal code changes.

Cross-Platform Compatibility.verification_plan: Testing on both iOS and Android devices to ensure functionality and responsiveness.
